ISSUE.TITLE: Only return 201 on creation
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Updating posts [returns a 201 right now](https://github.com/WP-API/WP-API/blob/e24264fa965c3f012f9c43a272768d27120b01f6/lib/endpoints/class-wp-json-posts-controller.php#L283), which is incorrect. The point of a `201 Created` is that it requires a `Location` header as well, to indicate where the new resource lives. This is because you `POST /wp/posts`, but end up with a new resource at `/wp/posts/42` instead. We need to remove the Location and 201 from updating.
